column5: Looking to pick up 1-3 guys to join our group with Eddie North (Attawapiskat River Adventures - http://www.eddienorth.com ) for a week long trip, flying in on Sat 8/21. From everything I've heard and read about this place it should be great. We'll be coming from Illinois, but can meet up in Nakina or hook up somewhere along the way. Please post reply or PM contact info. Thanks.
